verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees.<WH4609> When the LORD<WH3068> turned<WH7725> again the captivity<WH7622> of Zion,<WH6726> we were like them that dream.<WH2472>

Then<WH227> was our mouth<WH6310> filled<WH4390> with laughter,<WH7814> and our tongue<WH3956> with singing:<WH7440> then<WH227> said<WH559> they among the heathen,<WH1471> The LORD<WH3068> has done<WH6213> great<WH1431> things for them.
The LORD<WH3068> has done<WH6213> great<WH1431> things for us; whereof we are glad.<WH8056>
Turn<WH7725> again<WH7725> our captivity,<WH7622> O LORD,<WH3068> as the streams<WH650> in the south.<WH5045>
They that sow<WH2232> in tears<WH1832> shall reap<WH7114> in joy.<WH7440>
He that goes<WH3212> forth and weeps,<WH1058> bearing<WH5375> precious<WH4901> seed,<WH2233> shall doubtless come<WH935> again with rejoicing,<WH7440> bringing<WH5375> his sheaves<WH485> with him.
